content.text: Match ends, Lyon 3, Dinamo Zagreb 0.
Second Half ends, Lyon 3, Dinamo Zagreb 0.
Attempt missed. Mario Situm (Dinamo Zagreb) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Amer Gojak.
Attempt missed. Filip Benkovic (Dinamo Zagreb) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Junior Fernandes with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Dinamo Zagreb. Conceded by Jérémy Morel.
Attempt blocked. Amer Gojak (Dinamo Zagreb) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Hillel Soudani.

Foul by Mario Situm (Dinamo Zagreb).
Lucas Tousart (Lyon) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Mario Situm (Dinamo Zagreb) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Domagoj Pavicic.
Attempt saved. Lucas Tousart (Lyon) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Rachid Ghezzal.
